name: Thorn and Cutlas
description:
Use the power of illusions as you sneak through an unsuspecting facility searching for a wealth of riches rumored to have arrived to the town of Chiron!

Lone wolf Thorn seeks to prove her abilities as a mighty thief and powerful magic user as she plunders around a town filled with a hatred for magic. However, what she finds in one of her plunders may not be what she was expecting, and leads her into a mysterious hunt for answers that could decide the fate of all magic users in Chiron!

Created by Clay Lindstrom, Joshua Fife, Camille Jones, and Nicolas Avila.
